attributes.action: Request the BBC Trust to ask Mark Thompson Director General of the BBC to resign his post
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Director General of the BBC Mark Thompson should be requested the resign his post as Director General of the British Broadcasting Corporation.
Mark Thompson has presided and must be held accountable for the degeneration of the high standard expected of the BBC. Public and License fee monies have been used to facilitate this degeneration. Trust in the BBC has been eroded, and change of the Director General must take place.
